name: Escarole Salad With Mustard Dressing
recipeIngredient: 1 clove garlic, peeled and minced (about 1/2 teaspoon)
1 tablespoon fat from the drippings of the chicken

recipeInstructions.text: Remove the outside leaves of the escarole and cut the remainder into 2-inch pieces. Wash and dry thoroughly. You should have about 4 cups washed greens.
Blend the mustard, garlic, vinegar and olive oil in a bowl or jar.
Just before serving, combine the greens, the dressing and the reserved drippings and toss to mix.
